headline.main: Richard Petty Motorsports Committed to Running Hornish Jr.
headline.print_headline: Richard Petty Motorsports Committed to Running Hornish Jr.

docs.snippet: Sam Hornish Jr. is finally back in the Sprint Cup Series after a four-year absence, in a ride Richard Petty Motorsports insists it is committed to fielding for the entire year....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sam Hornish Jr. is finally back in the Sprint Cup Series after a four-year absence, in a ride Richard Petty Motorsports insists it is committed to fielding for the entire year.

headline.main: Fed to Extend Reverse Repo Tests Through End of Q1
headline.print_headline: Fed to Extend Reverse Repo Tests Through End of Q1

docs.snippet: The U.S. Federal Reserve will extend its testing of the term reverse repurchase program, a new tool it hopes will help control short-term interest rates when the time comes to tighten monetary policy....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Federal Reserve will extend its testing of the term reverse repurchase program, a new tool it hopes will help control short-term interest rates when the time comes to tighten monetary policy.

headline.main: Toyota Recalls 52,000 Avalon Sedans for Fire Risk
headline.print_headline: Toyota Recalls 52,000 Avalon Sedans for Fire Risk

docs.snippet: Toyota is recalling 52,000 Avalon sedans because of a wiring problem that could cause a fire....
docs.lead_paragraph: Toyota is recalling 52,000 Avalon sedans because of a wiring problem that could cause a fire.

headline.main: Irish Police Officer Shot During Visit to New Orleans
headline.print_headline: Irish Police Officer Shot During Visit to New Orleans

docs.snippet: An Irish police officer on vacation in New Orleans was shot by an armed robber, one of the latest victims in a string of shootings that have put the city on edge as it gets ready to kick off Carnival festivities....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Irish police officer on vacation in New Orleans was shot by an armed robber, one of the latest victims in a string of shootings that have put the city on edge as it gets ready to kick off Carnival festivities.

headline.main: Marlins Finalize $2 Million, 1-Year Deal With Ichiro Suzuki
headline.print_headline: Marlins Finalize $2 Million, 1-Year Deal With Ichiro Suzuki

docs.snippet: Ichiro Suzuki has passed his physical and finalized a $2 million, one-year contract with the Miami Marlins....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ichiro Suzuki has passed his physical and finalized a $2 million, one-year contract with the Miami Marlins.

headline.main: Controversial French Comic Tells Court He Seeks Peace
headline.print_headline: Controversial French Comic Tells Court He Seeks Peace

docs.snippet: Controversial French comic Dieudonne M'Bala M'Bala has told a court he wants "to make peace" with critics who have accused the 12-times convicted performer of anti-Semitism and inciting racial hatred....
docs.lead_paragraph: Controversial French comic Dieudonne M'Bala M'Bala has told a court he wants "to make peace" with critics who have accused the 12-times convicted performer of anti-Semitism and inciting racial hatred.

headline.main: Chicago Cubs' Ernie Banks Statue Moved Downtown for Tribute
headline.print_headline: Chicago Cubs' Ernie Banks Statue Moved Downtown for Tribute

docs.snippet: Ernie Banks fans got their first chance to pay their respects to the most famous and beloved Chicago Cub who ever played after the statue of the Hall of Famer was placed in a downtown plaza Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ernie Banks fans got their first chance to pay their respects to the most famous and beloved Chicago Cub who ever played after the statue of the Hall of Famer was placed in a downtown plaza Wednesday.

headline.main: Brady Fighting Cold, Not Worried About Health for Super Bowl
headline.print_headline: Brady Fighting Cold, Not Worried About Health for Super Bowl

docs.snippet: Tom Brady is dealing with a cold four days before the Super Bowl but says he'll be OK....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tom Brady is dealing with a cold four days before the Super Bowl but says he'll be OK.

headline.main: Raul Castro: US Must Return Guantanamo for Normal Relations
headline.print_headline: Raul Castro: US Must Return Guantanamo for Normal Relations

docs.snippet: Cuban President Raul Castro demanded on Wednesday that the United States return the U.S. base at Guantanamo Bay, lift the half-century trade embargo on Cuba and compensate his country for damages before the two nations re-establish normal relation...
docs.lead_paragraph: Cuban President Raul Castro demanded on Wednesday that the United States return the U.S. base at Guantanamo Bay, lift the half-century trade embargo on Cuba and compensate his country for damages before the two nations re-establish normal relations.
